website_summaries.verdict: Heavier than other designs, but with the weight comes supportive structure.
pros: Good for those who need neutral support or supinators
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Buyer must reconcile benefits and costs of added weight

customer_reviews.title: and they fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: You know those 'size down' reviews? They are absolutely right. I normally stick with my size and never size down.. (and I'm usually right). However this time I took a chance - and sized a half side down. I wear women's size 11 in most shoes. So I ordered a 10.5 in these.. and they fit like a glove. They are as bright as they appear on your screen, and yes comfy so far. I'm looking forward to running in them tomorrow (on treadmill) tomorrow. I love the look.. the fit and I think I'll be buying adidas more. I usually buy Reebok, Nike, and Ascics. This is a great buy overall, for me at least. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: These run an entire size large. I wear 8 for athletic shoes, I ordered 7 and they are perfect with room in the toe box for movement. Comfortable. Good cushion. These are great for treadmill etc. wouldn’t use for my outside runs.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. I have a wide foot, and they are plenty wide enough on my feet. I normally wear a size 9, but ordered a size 8.5 based on other reviews. Should have ordered an 8. Like I said, it's a comfortable shoe. However, it has no arch support. None! Therefore, I will wear an insole with the shoes, which is why I didn't return the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable, but run big
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned, but they do run quite large. When I first got them, I was on my feet all day for work and walking 30k steps a day, and never once did my feet start to ache in them.
customer_reviews.author: CKV

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking sneakers. Just run rather big.
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews of how these sneakers run big I ordered a size smaller than what I wear in nikes. I received them pretty quickly and tried them on. They were still too big. I was disappointed because they are really awesome sneakers. Very light weight. Comfortable. I had to return them. I wear an 8 1/2 in nikes. Which are a little big but I get them a little roomy for working out. I got a 7 1/2 in these sneakers and should have gotten a 7. My only complaint really is the sizing. Just make sure you try maybe a whole size down.
customer_reviews.author: brooke etzweiler

customer_reviews.title: Not womens sizing
customer_reviews.text: This is a mens wide i am an 8 and this was HUGE!! BEWARE NOT THE CORRECT DESCRIPTION
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are really comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really comfortable and supportive. I was nervous about sizing, but they fit perfectly for me. I wear an 8.5 and my feet are long and narrow. I put the shoes on without socks to see how they felt and they were comfortable. I had some extra room in the toe area which if you wear socks will not be a major problem. I put a picture pointing to where my toe was in the shoe without socks. I will admit when I first pulled them out the box I thought they were going to be too big, but they surprisingly fit just right! I’m super happy with my purchase and can’t wait to break them in!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Loved the shoes though
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 1/2 size smaller than normal because people said to, but that was STILL too large! Loved the shoes though, and am now waiting for the even smaller size to arrive. UPDATE: I ordered a FULL size smaller than normal and they fit perfectly! So I guess I'll leave that they fit too large, even though I (finally) found the perfect fit...which was an entire size larger than my normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I'M IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I just received these and I am in love . Best looking shoes I've owned . They are very comfortable and fit as expected . Verrrry nice and authentic ! I'm veryyyy happy with this purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Leister

customer_reviews.title: RUNS WAAAAY TOO BIG - Sized wrong for USA market
customer_reviews.text: Guy doing sizes must be smoking something - clearly says euro size correctly but USA size is incorrect - go by the euro size or buy them 1 full size down. Not crazy about the styling (makes your feet look huge) but they are comfortable for running and gym use.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: I'm a true 8.5 and the 8 fits perfect with wiggle room to spare
customer_reviews.text: I'm a True size 8.5, Size Down to an 8 ... The tongue isn't as open as normal shoes however once you get them on, the shoe feels like an 8.5 with some wiggle toe room to spare.. I'm glad that I went with the previous reviewers advice. They have amazing Arch Support. Something that I need. I don't have to use my custom orthotics from the Dr for my gym shoes. Great Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Goddess Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these shoes that I've purchased. I LOVE them! After suffering for 10 months with plantar fasciitis, and trying four different types of shoes, these were the ones that finally made a difference. The pain is nearly gone. Great arch & heel support, light weight, & breathable. Will buy again. Note: They run about a 1/2 size larger than usual. I wear 7.5 in Nike, and got these in a size 7. They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: L. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: They ended up looking like men's shoes
customer_reviews.text: These just fit awkwardly. They ended up looking like men's shoes. They were way too big. I love adidas, but these were terrible. Having said that, the seller took them back with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Dixon Beers

customer_reviews.title: My third pair!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable right out of the box. First pair I bought, I went down half a size, but I had to return for my usual size. I have used these on the elliptical and for boot camp classes. My sister requested a pair for Christmas (her second pair). She works in a nursing home and is on her feet all day, so she also likes this shoe. This time I picked up the coral color. Bold, bright, and gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable and almost kind of bouncy due to the thick ...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving these a 5-star rating because I read the other reviews and ordered smaller and they fit. They are very comfortable and almost kind of bouncy due to the thick sole. I normally wear a 7.5 in running shoes (Mizuno, Nike, Asics) and had to get a 6.5 in these. They fit just like a 7.5 women's so I would suggest going down an entire size.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Super Satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: If you know your european shoe size and order from the size chart accordingly, then the shoe will fit perfectly! If you don't know your european size, order 1/2 size smaller than your normal american sizing! This shoe is super comfortable and looks as awesome as I had hoped....super satisfied with this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Jilly P

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and Function
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not only beautiful, but so comfortable. I wear size 11 and I have a difficult time finding comfortable and right fitting shoes. I had knee surgery back in October and finally I have some shoes that give me stability and comfort. I am able to walk my three dogs without trouble balancing. They are not little dogs, but 100,70, and 60 pounds and they like to pull in all directions. We just walked about a mile and my knee does not hurt. I feel accomplished. Thank you Adidas.
customer_reviews.author: BeateGeorgia

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY & COMFORTABLE *****
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes I have the aqua/energy blue as well and are they pretty. Both pair fit my exact shoe size as ordered size 6. These shoes are comfortable. I have flat feet and most shoes during and after a 45min working out my feet start to hurt. NOT these they have plenty of room at the toe area. Buy'em, try'em you won't send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Cathycat

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: The fit is just not right. The hill elevation compered to front elevation is too high. You feel like you are walking on hills. Walking in those gave me shin splints. Too rigid. Way oversized. Unfortunately could not return them as I had to wear them for couple of days in order to get the sense of the shoe. $88 dollars down to the drain. UPDATE: these shoes also squeak as you walk and a bit DANGEROUS: they don't grip wet asphalt very well (especially the smooth one). I slipped and almost fell a dozen times.
customer_reviews.author: TAp waTer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe. Very cute and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Really love these shoes so far. Have had them about 2 months. I use them for weightlifting and running and they’ve been working well for both. Really lightweight which is great for running. Only downside is they are a little difficult to get into as there is no separate tongue on these. The shoe is more of a tight fit slip on with laces. Really comfortable once they are on though.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Downsize before buying! Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe runs big! I'm so glad I always read the reviews before buying anything and since everyone said it runs a bit big I chose to get a half size smaller, I'm normally a 5.5 so I got a size 5. And I was relieved how great they feel!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do still use them for running though and find they work great, but I typically run short distances (~3 miles)
customer_reviews.text: They do run a little large as reviews suggest. Normally, I wear a size 10.5 - 11 in shoes, ordered these in a 10 and they are just a bit big. I do still use them for running though and find they work great, but I typically run short distances (~3 miles), and can't comment on how they'd hold up on longer runs.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrinna Soldavini

customer_reviews.title: Buy half size smaller
customer_reviews.text: From previous reviews I read I made sure to order half a size down hoping that what I read was true. It is!! And its not a tight half size down either, there's still wiggle room. So definitely go down half a size. The shoes themselves are super comfy and give really good support. With some shoes, half way through a workout my feet would feel to tight and I'd have to loosen the laces. Not with these! I haven't experienced anything uncomfortable yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kari S.

customer_reviews.title: Made for giants!
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down the largest size 7 I've ever seen in my life, more like and 8-8.5. Come on Adidas!
customer_reviews.author: UnicornBoss

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes. Very comfortable. Run a little big, usually wear size 8 but ordered 7.5. It fits pretty good over all, but feels a little to wide for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon made the refund very easy. Refunded as soon as I sent back then ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely run BIG. Had to return, Amazon made the refund very easy. Refunded as soon as I sent back then reordered same day got shoes day and a half later. The shoes are awesome and very comfy. Totally cute. Just keep in mind they run very large. Order a size down.
customer_reviews.author: Mora house

customer_reviews.title: but I love them! Super comfy and perfect for the gym
customer_reviews.text: Order a size down, I’m a 7 in woman’s Nike’s and for a 6 in these perfectly, but I love them! Super comfy and perfect for the gym
customer_reviews.author: shelsea

customer_reviews.title: A quality footing for walking, jogging, and light running.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and the technology allows a quality footing for walking, jogging, and light running.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewBuyReview

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great! Very comfortable and look good
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! Very comfortable and look good. I am normally an 8.5-9. In tennis shoes I like to order 9s. These run a little big as they are not as narrow as other brands. They fit great, but the white at the bottom makes your feet look bigger than other tennis shoes. They are very comfortable and I have received a handful of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: it’s just not a structured shoe like other designs
customer_reviews.text: Fits 8 well, it’s just not a structured shoe like other designs. Comfortable. I bought an off color so price was good for Addidas.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a half size down as everyone recommended and still could have gone another half down
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size down as everyone recommended and still could have gone another half down, but as a walking shoe I prefer the room. I recommend looking at the size charge as I know my Euro size and just followed that. These are cool, but pretty big.
customer_reviews.author: Langley

customer_reviews.title: Run way way too large.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan. They run VERY big. Manufacturing is from many countries so quality is very different from one pair to next. I bought from several places trying to get a pair that worked for me and gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! I have wide feet and these aren’t snug on my toes at all. Super comfortable and well made. I’ll never buy Nike’s again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe, runs long
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 7.5 to 8.0 and have a wide foot. I purchased a size 7.5 M width in these shoes and they fit more like a large 8.0 or an 8.5. I will keep them and wear thick socks because they aren't uncomfortable and I love the look. They just run extremely long.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Too, too big. Size down two sizes.
customer_reviews.text: These were too, too big, my normal size 6.5. I think I exchanged for a 6, still too big, still have not worn again. Will try to wear with two pairs of socks. I did not want to be bothered with returning again. Color is neon, not exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy.1

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 3 of these over the last year for work purposes. These fit wonderful and make such a difference on my feet for long shifts! I have ordered 2 in this color and 1 in a pink. The pink did not fit well. It was large but I think I used a different seller for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Run big
customer_reviews.text: As the other reviews stated, these definitely run big and you should order a whole size down. I'm normally a size 11, although I may be more of an 11.5 since sometimes size 11 shoes can be a little small on me. I ordered size 11 and size 10 probably would have fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopperChi

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Wow is how your feet feel...most comfy of all my Adidas. Super happy that i purchased them. i feel like i can run forever (i am not a runner). They definitely are a eye catcher. everyone will comment on shoes.
customer_reviews.author: N B.

customer_reviews.title: Integral tongue not for me
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has a really constricting integrated tongue that was no it for me. Too tight, returned.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these for running, but definitely size down!!! Very common for Adidas shoes to run larger.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Big but good
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11 sneaker and have a wide foot. But due to the reviews I went down a size to a 10.5 the sneaker fits good. Still a little loose in the toe area with about a half inch room extra. but definitely a good feel. I will be keeping these. I don't know if I'd recommend if you have a narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inflexible soles
customer_reviews.text: I got the fit OK after sizing down as other reviewers suggested but the soles of these shoes are stiff and inflexible. You can get a much more comfortable shoe for a lot less money.
customer_reviews.author: M.Rivers

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are still super cute though
customer_reviews.text: Just an FYI these shoes run larger than actual size. So when ordering you may want to order a whole size smaller. I've already ordered them twice and am in the process of returning them again. Now I don't know if all addidas run large or not but I usually wear a size 81/2 or 9 in women, I have the 8.5 now and am returning them for an 8. To be on the same side and avoid ordering and re-ordering and losing $6 everytime, just order them a whole size smaller. The shoes are still super cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Nyanna J.

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable shoes. I returned because I was looking for a shoe that was less obtrusive for the summer. I would definitely consider these for the gym and working out. The tongue sticks up higher and did not fit my shorts/no socks option I was going for. The color of this shoe is good too. Just not for me right now.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These are soooo cute!! And pretty comfortable. I am not sure if my feet have gotten wider after having my son but they feel a tad bit narrow. My feet tend to get achey after a while and it feels like it's the width that is too tight around my feet. Otherwise, these are awesome shoes and very stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Material seems fine
customer_reviews.text: But if you have a narrow foot, there might be a better choice out there. Not the problem of the shoe, just a problem with my narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: Pookie

customer_reviews.title: WAY too big!!
customer_reviews.text: WAY too big even after ordering smaller size. Poor arch support as well, the shoe completely flattened out when I stepped down on it. Color was great!. Returned and purchased a different product.
customer_reviews.author: dmg

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great, and have been holding up well. The only issue I have is with the opening to put my feet through is very tight, even when the laces are undone...never had this issue with an athletic shoe before.
customer_reviews.author: jenny g

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing about this shoe is the comfort and the sole construction that helps with balance. I am diabetic and have a difficult time finding shoes that are kind to my feet. I have purchased specific shoes designed for the diabetic foot over the years but never found one I could keep on all day until I bought these. I will be purchasing more in some of the fun colors. The thing I like least about this shoe is the tug of war getting them on, so glad they have the loops on the front and back of the shoe to slip your fingers in to pull them on.
customer_reviews.author: S R Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Have to return
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear size 7. Ordered a 6.5 after reading the reviews and they are still too big. The shoe laces are very stiff. The back of the sneakers (not deep enough) are not hugging the heels well. Have to return.
customer_reviews.author: bun

customer_reviews.title: different pairs come, one was small, the other ...
customer_reviews.text: different pairs come, one was small, the other was big. i think wrong label were attached. i can't return because i bought it when i visited US. anyway please make sure before ship for other customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kang young mook

customer_reviews.title: To big.  No return label
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size smaller to be safe and they are way to large. Asked for a return refund and am unable to print return label. Now I have a rather large pair of exspensive shoes I cant wear :( nooo
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: It's like walking on clouds
customer_reviews.text: My significant other has flat feet and bunions, we've tried multiple brands and styles. This is the only shoe that provides lots of room and a lot of cushion in the heal, this is the second pair of the same style we've gotten.
customer_reviews.author: Levoy

customer_reviews.title: I want more
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 8 wide but the 8m fit perfect..no break in time at all.. good support..I luv them....I got the corral color and they r so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: shadowdeb

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could have loved this shoe but..tongue is attached to both sides and stretch was still too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! Love the Color!
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews and decided to order an 8 1/2 instead of a 9 - The are a little small but seem to be stretching a little - I have a Narrow foot and they fit great! Next time, I will deferentially get the 9 though.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wood

customer_reviews.title: I can’t even get them on my foot...
customer_reviews.text: They are cute, and I would like to be able to comment about comfort and whether or not they run large/small, but I wasn’t even able to get them on due to the way the tongue is attached. I don’t want to have to struggle to slip my feet into shoes. I don’t have wide feet, either.
customer_reviews.author: Betty GoLightly

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but comfortable. Good support for my weak ankles. Fits well. Have to loosen ties to get foot in. Plenty of toe room. I do not worry about sliding on floor since this is no slip.
customer_reviews.author: long islander

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Get a half size down. Too long and big. I have to pull the laces super tight just to fit my foot
customer_reviews.author: MitaMossBalls

customer_reviews.title: Super Huge and Bulky
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so big and bulky, I was hoping that they were constructed with trampoline-like springs so I could bounce around. They’re not.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A Steal!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes at an even greater price. I wear an 11 for comfort and bought a 10.5 that fits perfectly! I bought these to run my first 5k and they got me through gracefully. I have a wide foot so they were a little tight at first, but after a few wears they fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Muffy

customer_reviews.title: I've tried them on and so far comfort level says good. The sneaker is a bit chunkier than I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product a 3 only because I haven't actually with them to truly rate. I've tried them on and so far comfort level says good. The sneaker is a bit chunkier than I was expecting and probably wouldn't not have been a preference of mine. I do love the color and normally I go for basic neutral and black sneakers but this was a fun purchase for me. For the price it was a win win.
customer_reviews.author: DMorales

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: ENORMOUS. I originally thought they sent me a men's size. Definitely order a size smaller than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hendershot

customer_reviews.title: Neon Yellow Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Finding yellow running shows are harder than you think- these hit the mark. I generally run between an 8 to 9 in running shoes. My last pair of Adidas were an 8 but snug. I got the 8 1/2 and they are slightly big but let me wear ticker socks vs only thin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Great color but it’s too big like 2 size up. So sad I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: C Ni

customer_reviews.title: My go to shoe
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shoe, it's comfortable for long days at work or just running errands. The dark green color is my favorite as it conceals dirt easier than the light colored options. I own this style of shoe in 3 other colors and happily rotate through them so that I don't wear them out. In my experience adidas shoes run half a size bigger than my typical size so I always make sure to size down for all adidas shoe styles.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: HIIT Shoe That Works!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable right out of the box. The toe box is a little slim but not extremely narrow. I used these shoes for OTF (Orange Theory Fitness), so they are stable and cushioned enough for HIIT. So glad I went with these as I tried them on in a running specialty store for training shoes. They are a tad large even with me down sizing a half size but I wouldn’t dare go down a foot size. Enough space for swelling feet.
customer_reviews.author: L Marie

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Wonens Alphabounce
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, design, but, could be more cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait to purchase online
customer_reviews.text: Fav new shoes; always been a nikes girl and decided to venture out... glad I did and so so glad I didn't buy these in store because they're literally like double the price. Super comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.author: Devan Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Beware, these shoes run really large!
customer_reviews.text: I read that the shoes run large, so I ordered a half size smaller. They were still way too big. Now I have to return them and wouldn't know what size to order.
customer_reviews.author: jan seebeck

customer_reviews.title: Runs toooooo big in length and width
customer_reviews.text: Ended up buying a size smaller than I normally take Still a bit big Had to return but Sneakers are very nice looking
customer_reviews.author: CCP

customer_reviews.title: They run large
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I wear a 7 in Most shoes but with sneakers I usually get 7.5 so socks don’t make them feel tight. With these i ordered a 7 and they have plenty of Room even with socks. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Norwood

customer_reviews.title: great style and color
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe style and color, easy on and comfortable. I just have one foot that it did not fit as well on as the other and reluctantly had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Seed Chomper

customer_reviews.title: Size down
customer_reviews.text: Didn't pay attention to the reviews. I know somebody that had the shoes she never said she had to size down.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce A. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Nice show. Inner liner. Order down
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe. Not as much arch support as I thought there would be. I am a 9 and I ordered an 8. Fit well but it has an inner liner that I didn't read it had which makes it snug in areas that didnt work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Hideth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and airy shoe. They do run about a half size larger than other shoes. The one piece tongue stays where it belongs and there is decent arch support.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: So in love with these!
customer_reviews.text: OMG I never knew shoes could be this comfortable. I feel like I am walking on soft cushions!!! I definitely have been buying the wrong shoes! And the funny thing is I am not a closed shoe person....but I am now!
customer_reviews.author: Christine R

customer_reviews.title: Great training shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfy yet supportive. I use for short runs (less than 5 miles) nd they are great. Super lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were super comfortable and had good arch support. My only complaint is these were at least a size too large. Next pair I will order accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes very comfortable on heels
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes very comfortable on heels. as a nurse I need support. My orthotics first well inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: way too big
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why but these shoes were at least two sizes too big
customer_reviews.author: PrincessJas

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe just received two left feet
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I was sent 2 left shoes, but I loved the one I put on my feet. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: Mommabritt22

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly comfortable. Great to work in even. I order 8.5 cause it's seems I wear that aot more now than an 8. However these I could of used an 8. They look great too.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers but they do run big
customer_reviews.text: Great style and love the color (blue). It is a great running sneaker with decent arch support but I too wished I would have ordered a 1/2 size down because they are just a little too big. I was so eager to wear them when they arrived that I didn't want to return them! I will just wear thicker socks.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahjake

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have bunions on both feet and sometimes find it difficult to find a comfortable sneaker. This sneaker feels absolutely wonderful on my feet. I walked two miles and felt no pain. I look forward to purchasing another pair.
customer_reviews.author: alice h forth

customer_reviews.title: I love my Adidas but am disappointed with these because they ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my Adidas but am disappointed with these because they run large. I am always a size six and these are wide and long ... good if you wear thick socks
customer_reviews.author: NJane B-LO NY

customer_reviews.title: The alphabounce is the truth!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are everything to me!! I also have the chalk ones, they felt so good on my feet that I HAD to get another pair! I workout everyday and am on my feet all day, the toe box is wider, which helps not squish my toes together. If you are looking for a comfortable, stable shoe...you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: missym843

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They are comfortable and I love the color. I've always been a fan of the Adidas brand because of how long the last and they support my arches perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My wife got these shoes and she loves them! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K Thomas

customer_reviews.title: ... 1/2 size smaller but got new pair and just love them. Super comfortable for running
customer_reviews.text: Had to return for 1/2 size smaller but got new pair and just love them. Super comfortable for running. Gonna buy more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. So comfortable. I own these and the blue ones. So glad I found these on Amazon for less than the Addidas website.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Daniel

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are comfortable, not exceptionally supporting
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected if you want to size down (one size). The shoes are comfortable, not exceptionally supporting, but you have to use a shoe horn or other method to get these tie-slip on shoes on.
customer_reviews.author: Cora May

customer_reviews.title: When Buying Addidas you need to by a half size smaller than shoe size
customer_reviews.text: The 8 1/2 is too large. It does not fit like my "Brooks or NuBalance."
customer_reviews.author: Henrietta A. Whitty

customer_reviews.title: The shoes themselves were great. But I needed to get a smaller size ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes themselves were great. But I needed to get a smaller size and quick and amazon was not able to accommodate that :(
customer_reviews.author: Natural mermaid mama

customer_reviews.title: Run big
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable but run a full size larger than I normally wear. If you want to play it safe, order 1/2 size smaller but you’ll probably need to wear a thicker sock.
customer_reviews.author: CFed

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Super cute and comfy. I like my tennis shoes a little larger than my normal shoe and other reviews said these run large, so I ordered my normal size. They are perfect and just a little roomy in the toes like I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: Slightly less padding in the soul then I expected, I have a similar pair more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA SACHETTA

customer_reviews.title: Adidas is life!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent condition, great price. I would take this option again!!
customer_reviews.author: rooseveltq

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great comfy shoe. Medium support. Hurts my toes a little as I use them to keep steady as the support isnt perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JnJ

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and fit!
customer_reviews.text: Loved them been looking for this colour but just waited till they went on sale 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Awana Taylor

product_meta.title: adidas Women's Alphabounce Em W Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Find your flow in these women's running shoes. They bounce midsole cushions every foot strike for enhanced comfort. With a forged mesh upper that hugs and expands with your foot, the shoes have a durable outsole that provides long-lasting wear run after run.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
BOUNCE provides energized comfort for all sports, all day
Seamless FORGEDMESH upper designed with areas of support and stretch to help ensure a custom fit that adapts to every move
ADIWEAR outsole offers the ultimate in high-wear durability
